content: the able cable hat by kari steinetz with corrections as of april 20 2012 in bold now you can make a cable look hat without the cable needle using only common increase and decrease stitches the result is a particularly stretchy fabric for a one size fits all garment the appearance from the crown is not bad either pattern offered for free so please make at least one for charity materials worsted or heavy worsted yarn green sample is joann s sincerely ombre sample is impeccable by loops and threads size 8 circular needle of choice and size 8 double pointed needles for crown decrease child size blue hat made with size 5 needles and caron simply soft yarn stitch methods include yarn over yo knitting through the back loop k1 tbl making a purl stitch increase m1p slip slip knit 2 together ssk and purl 2 together p2tog cast on 80 sts join in the round without twisting for a really large hat cast on 96 place marker work brim in knit 2 purl 2 ribbing for a least 1 inch or make it 2 5 inches for fold up brim set up round knit 14 m1p p2 repeat all around to marker now work rounds 1 through 10 as follows round 1 yo k3 ssk k9 p3 repeat to marker round 2 k1 tbl yo k3 ssk k8 p3 repeat to marker round 3 k1 k1 tbl yo k3 ssk k7 p3 repeat to marker round 4 k2 k1 tbl yo k3 ssk k6 p3 repeat to marker round 5 k3 k1 tbl yo k3 ssk k5 p3 repeat to marker round 6 k4 k1 tbl yo k3 ssk k4 p3 repeat to marker round 7 k5 k1 tbl yo k3 ssk k3 p3 repeat to marker round 8 k6 k1 tbl yo k3 ssk k2 p3 repeat to marker round 9 k7 k1 tbl yo k3 ssk k1 p3 repeat to marker round 10 k8 k1 tbl yo k3 ssk p3 repeat to marker repeat rounds 1 through 10 but use the following new round for round 1 only new round 1 yo k3 ssk k4 k1 tbl k4 p3 repeat to marker do a total of three or four repeats of rds 1 10 on your last repeat of round 10 eliminate the yo last round 10 k8 k1 tbl k3 ssk p3 repeat to marker now start decrease rounds switch to double pointed needles when necessary or use method of choice decrease 1 k3 ssk k8 p3 repeat to marker decrease 2 k3 ssk k7 p3 repeat to marker decrease 3 k3 ssk k6 p3 repeat to marker decrease 4 k3 ssk k5 p3 repeat to marker decrease 5 k3 ssk k4 p3 repeat to marker decrease 6 k3 ssk k3 p2tog p1 repeat to marker decrease 7 ssk k1 ssk k2 p2 repeat to marker decrease 8 ssk ssk k1 p2 repeat to marker decrease 9 k1 ssk p2tog repeat to marker decrease 10
